g:HTMLPanel.p:
We have emailed:
Our camp leaders, to let them know you have applied.
You, to let you know the process completed, and remind you of some steps you should take to connect with the HeeBee tribe.

NOTICE! There has been an email failure.
Don't worry, your application has most likely been saved, we probably just had an email glitch.
Please email Scarab, and make note of the email address you have used for this application.
Please return to: www.HeeBeeGeeBeeHealers.org and read up on camp life.
